content.text:
# Draft:1892–93 Queens Park Rangers F.C. season

The 1892–93 Queens Park Rangers season was the club's 5th season of existence
Green and white hooped Shirts were introduced and first trophy is won, the West London Observer Cup.
Season summary
Results
QPR scores given first
